content.raw: Just for clarification (as Brian seems to be happy with cases A and B?), a real lidar would not add noise to an out of range reading (and it also shouldn't return ``max range`` but rather ``\inf`` or at least a value outside the possible range, otherwise you don't know the difference between a valid reading and free space, but that's a different [issue](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/124/hokuya-laser-sensor-in-drc-sim-should) ...).
